H0.text: The lead singer of which band is known as Suggs. The Specials

H1.text: The lead singer of which band is known as Suggs. The Selecter

H2.text: The lead singer of which band is known as Suggs. Bad Manners

H3.text: The lead singer of which band is known as Suggs. Madness

A4.text: Graham McPherson, known as Suggs, became the lead vocalist of the band that later changed its name to Madness in 1979.

A5.text: Graham 'Suggs' McPherson is listed as a current member of Madness.
